verses.verse: Finally, <S%G3063><s%> my brothers, <S%G80><s%> rejoice <S%G5463><s%> in the Lord. <S%G2962><s%> To write <S%G1125><s%> the same <S%G846><s%> things to you, to me indeed <S%G3303><s%> is not grievous, <S%G3636><s%> but for you it is safe. <S%G804><s%>

But what <S%G3748><s%> things were gain <S%G2771><s%> to me, those <S%G5023><s%> I counted <S%G2233><s%> loss <S%G2209><s%> for Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

Yes <S%G235><s%> doubtless, <S%G3304><s%> and I count <S%G2233><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things but loss <S%G2209><s%> for the excellency <S%G5242><s%> of the knowledge <S%G1108><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> my Lord: <S%G2962><s%> for whom <S%G3739><s%> I have <S%G2192><s%> suffered <S%G2210><s%> the loss <S%G2210><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> things, and do count <S%G2233><s%> them but dung, <S%G4657><s%> that I may win <S%G2770><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%>

And be found <S%G2147><s%> in him, not having <S%G2192><s%> my <S%G1699><s%> own <S%G1699><s%> righteousness, <S%G1343><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is of the law, <S%G3551><s%> but that which <S%G3588><s%> is through <S%G1223><s%> the faith <S%G4102><s%> of Christ, <S%G5547><s%> the righteousness <S%G1343><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is of God <S%G2316><s%> by faith: <S%G4102><s%>

That I may know <S%G1097><s%> him, and the power <S%G1411><s%> of his resurrection, <S%G386><s%> and the fellowship <S%G2842><s%> of his sufferings, <S%G3804><s%> being made <S%G4832><s%> conformable <S%G4832><s%> to his death; <S%G2288><s%>
If <S%G1513><s%> by any <S%G4458><s%> means <S%G4458><s%> I might attain <S%G2658><s%> to the resurrection <S%G1815><s%> of the dead. <S%G3498><s%>

Not as though <S%G3754><s%> I had already <S%G2235><s%> attained, <S%G2983><s%> either <S%G2228><s%> were already <S%G2235><s%> perfect: <S%G5048><s%> but I follow <S%G1377><s%> after, if <S%G1499><s%> that I may apprehend <S%G2638><s%> that for which <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> I am apprehended <S%G2638><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

I press <S%G1377><s%> toward <S%G2596><s%> the mark <S%G4649><s%> for the prize <S%G1017><s%> of the high <S%G507><s%> calling <S%G2821><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> in Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

Let us therefore, <S%G3767><s%> as many <S%G3745><s%> as be perfect, <S%G5046><s%> be thus <S%G5124><s%> minded: <S%G5426><s%> and if <S%G1487><s%> in any <S%G1536><s%> thing you be otherwise <S%G2088><s%> minded, <S%G5426><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> shall reveal <S%G601><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> to you.

(For many <S%G4183><s%> walk, <S%G4043><s%> of whom <S%G3739><s%> I have <S%G2192><s%> told <S%G3004><s%> you often, <S%G3740><s%> and now <S%G3568><s%> tell <S%G3004><s%> you even <S%G2532><s%> weeping, <S%G2799><s%> that they are the enemies <S%G2190><s%> of the cross <S%G4716><s%> of Christ: <S%G5547><s%>

For our conversation <S%G4175><s%> is in heaven; <S%G3772><s%> from where <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> we look <S%G553><s%> for the Savior, <S%G4990><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ: <S%G5547><s%>
